description:
Bob teaches John how to cozy up with a girl at karaoke. Triton of the Sea ruins a live shopping show. Boyacky`s guest, Tink, describes the first time he had fruit punch. The dumbass couple arrives at the Guam airport.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bob`s Karaoke Lecture / Good Buy Shopping / Boyacky`s Room / Dumb Couple Goes to Guam: Immigration
Hakushon Daimaou no Karaoke Lecture / Goodbye Shopping (Fukugou Copyki Hen) / Boyacky no Heya / Bakappuru Guam e Iku: Nyuukoku Shinsa Hen
ハクション大魔王のカラオケレクチャー / グッバイ・ショッピング(複合コピー機編) / ボヤッキーの部屋 / バカップル グアムへ行く 入国審査編
